trait.name: Reduced Threat
entries: A reduced-threat monster takes a −2 penalty on attack rolls (included in the stat block), ability checks (included in the stat block for skill proficiencies), saving throws (included in the stat block for saving throw proficiencies), and saving throw DCs (included in the stat block).

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hezrou has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the hezrou must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the hezrou's stench for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hezrou makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.
